about_the_game:
Twelve brand-new exclusive minions and new exclusive bonds

The new character 'Decotine' comes with twelve new minions, covering various classes including healer, mage, warrior, archer, and shield. Additionally, there are more new exclusive bonds under the 'Empire' category, which can be combined with other bonds to create different styles and distinctive team systems.

The new character is also applicable to both the 'Endless Mode' and 'Journey of Chaos' modes.

Brand-New Minion Equipment, More Powerful Assistance

The new exclusive equipment tailored for the new minions enhances their attributes significantly. Additionally, there are corresponding bond equipment items that help form your lineup more quickly.

Unlock New Elemental Magic Cards, Freeze the Enemy

The new character "Decotine" hails from the Yuga Empire and specializes in using freezing magic attacks, featuring brand-new magic card animations and effects.

Four New Storylines, Different Combinations Lead to Different Endings

This update continues the established feature of different storylines based on character combinations. Decotine has unique storylines and branching endings with Lesley, Holy, Aska and Kamisari.

short_description: The new character "Decotine" from "Girls of The Tower" is now officially released! As the princess of the Yuga Empire, she embarks on an adventurous journey to perform a sealing ritual to revive her family. Brand-new minions, exclusive bonds, equipment, magic cards, and storylines are now available!
